headline: Morgan Stanley Boosts Applied Materials (AMAT) Target on Strong DRAM Spending Outlook
summary: Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) is included among the 13 Best Performing Long Term Stocks to Invest in. On February 25, Morgan Stanley raised its price recommendation on Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) to $432 from $420 and maintained an Overweight rating on the shares. The analyst also named the stock a Top Pick in U.S. Semiconductor […]
